page.title: 20A Schoolboy
page.content: I am the second shortest boy in class. I am 1.27m and weigh 24kg. I have pale blue eyes and blond hair with black spots in it. I like to wear my army clothes and my Street Hawk clothes. I like playing cricket and swimming. I watch television. My favourite programme is 'A Team', 'Street Hawk' and 'Captain Scarlet'. I collect little stone animals that I get in a shop in Crewkerne. I have one hobby at home and that is cycling. I am an untidy person and I don't even brush my hair in the morning. I like playing in the rain and making a mess of the place.I go over to my Nan's in the summer holidays and enjoy myself.
